definition: (main) hall/large room for a specific purpose/CL:間|间[jian1]/relationship between cousins etc on the paternal side of a family/of the same clan/classifier for classes, lectures etc/classifier for sets of furniture
younger brother/junior male/I (modest word in letter)
wife of younger male cousin via male line/younger cousins via male line
wife of younger male cousin via male line

sentences.english: He corrupted his cousin with money.
Jennifer and Joe are my cousins.
sentences.chinese: 詹妮弗和乔是我的堂妹和堂弟。

sentences.english: My cousin has a pet rat.
My cousin is an excellent diver , not to mention a swimmer.
sentences.chinese: 我的堂弟是个很好的潜水者，更别说他泳技很好了。

sentences.english: Dad went to buy some stationery as souvenirs for my cousin.
sentences.chinese: 父亲去买了一些文具作为记念品送给堂弟。

sentences.english: It was too late for Teng De. With his last breath, he told his cousin to pass his wages to his mother.
sentences.chinese: 直到腾德快咽气时，仍嘱咐堂弟把他的工钱交给母亲。

sentences.english: Elizabeth, John's mother, was a cousin of Mary.
sentences.chinese: 伊丽莎白，约翰的母亲，是一个玛丽堂弟。

sentences.english: His cousin was a coward corroded by money.
sentences.chinese: 他的堂弟是个被钱腐蚀的懦夫。

sentences.english: Tonight I want to play computer brother.
sentences.chinese: 今晚我要和堂哥堂弟玩电脑。

sentences.english: His cousin will come into all his property in the event of his death.
sentences.chinese: 万一他去世，所有财产都将由他的堂弟继承。

sentences.english: He was taken to hospital with another cousin, Shadi, who was wounded in the stomach by shrapnel.
sentences.chinese: 他和另一个生还的堂弟夏迪一起被送进医院里。

sentences.english: Your younger cousin plays for Brondby. Do you keep in touch regularly?
sentences.chinese: 你的小堂弟在布隆德比踢球，你们经常联系吗？

sentences.english: So he thought of his cousin who worked in the Aviation Council.
sentences.chinese: 于是他想到他那在航空理事会工作的堂弟。

sentences.english: His cousin is too young to attend the event.
sentences.chinese: 他堂弟太小不能参加这项活动。

definition: younger male cousin via female line
older male cousin via female line
older male cousin via female line
son of a male cousin via female line
